Title: Land availability and acquisition risk
Description: Relates to the unavailability of land or site to construct the infrastructure at the time of contract signature

Title: Environmental risk
Description: Environmental risks might be related to a number of environmental issues such as general contamination, pollution, water contamination, impact on the natural environment etc. An adverse assessment might lead to changes in design, leading to a direct impact on cost of infrastructure

Title: Design risks
Description: Represents the possibility that design quality for the asset is not adequate to meet project requirements

Title: Construction risks
Description: Represents the possibility that during the construction Phase, the actual project costs or construction time exceeds the projected time and costs

Title: Completion and commissioning
Description: Refers to the failure to meet the construction outcome or finalization as prescribed

Title: Revenue risk
Description: Refers to the risk of the revenue flows not being correctly assessed

Title: Foreign exchange, inflation and indexation risk
Description: Risk that changes in exchange rates or inflation adversely affect the project outcomes

Title: Availability and quality risk
Description: Risk linked to availability and quality issues relating to performance requirements and performance target levels

Title: Other revenue risk events
Description: credit or counterparty risk; fraud/non-payment by users

Title: Availability of finance
Description: Represents the risk of financing not being available at commercial close or before construction starts

Title: Refinancing risks
Description: Risks relating to the downside of refinancing

Title: Changes in law
Description: Risk that a change in general law or the sector regulatory framework adversely affect the project

Title: Force majeure
Description: Risk that external events beyond the control of the parties to the contract, such as natural disasters, wars, terrorism etc., affect the project

Title: Early termination

Title: Compliance risks
Description: Risks deriving from the compliance or lack thereof of regulatory obligations related to the development of the project

Title: All risks
Description: All risks deriving from the project
